item.title: 梅塔失误引发科技界恐慌，大额盈利迫在眉睫
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司令人失望的财报让科技投资者惶恐不安，因为未来几天股市中一些最大、最重要的公司都将发布财报。【原文：A disappointing earnings report from Meta Platforms Inc. has technology investors on edge with results from some of the stock market’s biggest and most important companies due in the coming days.】

item.title: 必和必拓集团考虑收购英美资源集团的可能性
item.description: 知情人士称，必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）正在考虑收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），这将成为今年最大的交易之一。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. is considering a potential takeover of Anglo American Plc, people with knowledge of the matter said, in what would rank as one of the year’s biggest deals.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）考虑直接禁止衍生品押注美国大选
item.description: 据熟悉该计划的人士透露，华尔街最高监管机构正在考虑全面禁止使用衍生品为美国大选下注，作为打击所谓事件合约的一部分。【原文：A top Wall Street regulator is considering an outright ban on using derivatives to bet on US elections as part of a crackdown on so-called event contracts, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 杰富瑞首席执行官出售 6,500 万美元股票为购买游艇提供资金
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.首席执行官里奇-汉德勒（Rich Handler）出售了其投资银行的 6500 万美元股票，部分是为了给自己买一份礼物--一艘游艇。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Rich Handler sold $65 million of shares in his investment bank partly to buy a present for himself — a yacht.】

item.title: 福特因电动车战略调整而销售和利润超出预期
item.description: 福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co., Ltd.）在插电式汽车市场减速的情况下迅速调整其电动汽车战略，公布的第一季度业绩因工作用卡车销售强劲而超出预期。【原文：Ford Motor Co., rapidly retooling its electric vehicle strategy in a decelerating market for plug-ins, posted first-quarter results that beat expectations on strong sales of work trucks.】

item.title: 美国家电需求停滞不前，惠而浦裁员 1,000 人
item.description: 惠而浦公司（Whirlpool Corp.）是美泰克（Maytag）和安曼（Amana）家电品牌的所有者，由于美国家居销售放缓限制了需求，该公司正在全球范围内裁减约 1000 个受薪职位，以降低成本。【原文：Whirlpool Corp., the owner of the Maytag and Amana appliance brands, is cutting about 1,000 salaried positions worldwide to reduce costs as slow US home sales limit demand.】

item.title: 花旗银行希望为贝瑞、格拉特菲尔特交易提供 20 亿美元的一揽子债务方案
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.）和富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Wells Fargo & Co. are preparing a $2 billion debt package to support Berry Global Group Inc.’s spinoff of the majority of its health, hygiene and specialties business with Glatfelter Corp., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 艾因霍恩的 Greenlight 上季度表现逊于 "崩溃 "的股市
item.description: 大卫-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）的绿光资本公司（Greenlight Capital）在致投资者的一封信中称，该公司在今年年初的表现逊于 "基本面崩溃 "的股市。【原文：David Einhorn’s Greenlight Capital underperformed the “fundamentally broken” stock market at the start of the year, according to a letter to investors.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗公司认为尽管多斯博卡斯公司的业务有所增长，但墨西哥燃料需求仍在增长
item.description: 瓦莱罗能源公司（Valero Energy Corp. ）预计墨西哥的燃料需求将继续增长，即使旗舰企业多斯博卡斯炼油厂（Dos Bocas refinery）将提高国内产量，而且总统候选人也提出向更多的绿色能源转变。【原文：Valero Energy Corp. expects fuel demand to grow in Mexico, even with the flagship Dos Bocas refinery set to ramp up domestic production and the presidential frontrunner proposing a shift to more green energy.】

item.title: KKR 为其最新全球基础设施基金融资 110 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，KKR & Co.为其最新的全球基础设施基金筹集了 110 亿美元，超过了目标的一半。【原文：KKR & Co. raised $11 billion for its latest global infrastructure fund, more than half of its target, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加纳矿工寻求终止未来全球资源公司的租约
item.description: 加纳矿工工会要求终止 Future Global Resources 有限公司的采矿租约，因为该公司缺乏投资和运营三年多前收购的 Bogoso-Prestea 金矿的资金。【原文：Ghana Mine Workers Union is demanding the termination of the mining lease of Future Global Resources Ltd. because the company lacks the finances to invest and operate the Bogoso-Prestea gold mine it acquired more than three years ago.】

item.title: 对交易商而言，美国联邦贸易委员会禁止竞业禁止条款会带来巨大风险
item.description: 如果华尔街的交易员和基金经理们希望美国新出台的竞业禁止条款禁令能为他们扫清障碍，让他们投向薪酬更高的竞争对手的怀抱，那么他们可能要失望了。【原文：Wall Street traders and money managers could be in for disappointment if they’re hoping a new US ban on non-compete clauses will clear the way for them to spring into the arms of higher-paying competitors.】

item.title: 穆迪下调波音信用评级后，波音信用评级濒临垃圾级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周三发表声明，将波音公司的信用评级从 Baa2 下调至 Baa3。评级展望为负面。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded Boeing’s credit rating to Baa3 from Baa2, according to a statement Wednesday. The rating outlook is negative.】

item.title: 如果与 Coach 所有者 Tapestry 的交易失败，范思哲所有者 Capri 的股价将下跌 30
item.description: 如果与 Tapestry Inc. 的 85 亿美元合作提案未能通过，Capri Holdings Ltd. 的股价有可能下跌约 30% 或更多。【原文：There’s a risk that shares of Capri Holdings Ltd. decline by roughly 30% or more if a proposed $8.5 billion tieup with Tapestry Inc. fails to get across the finish line.】

item.title: 西班牙桑切斯表示考虑辞去总理职务
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）说，由于他和他的妻子最近几周受到攻击，他正在考虑辞职。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said he is considering resigning due to the attacks that he and his wife have faced in recent weeks.】

item.title: Concord 准备提高 Hipgnosis 出价，以超越 Blackstone
item.description: 据知情人士透露，音乐版权投资者 Concord 正准备将其对 Hipgnosis Songs Fund Ltd. 的出价提高至 15 亿美元以上，以击败竞争对手 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Music rights investor Concord is preparing to increase its offer for Hipgnosis Songs Fund Ltd. to more than $1.5 billion as it seeks to beat rival suitor Blackstone Inc., people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: ADQ 谈判破裂后，KKR 搁置 100 亿美元的 Upfield 出售计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 KKR & Co.正在搁置对 Flora 和 Country Crock 涂料生产商 Upfield 的出售程序，该公司原计划筹资约 100 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm KKR & Co. is shelving a sale process for Upfield, the maker of Flora and Country Crock spreads, that was seeking to raise about $10 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 5 年期国债销售需求创新高，但仍维持亏损状态
item.description: 美国国债周三小幅收跌，因为市场吸收了创纪录规模的 700 亿美元五年期国债销售。【原文：US Treasuries retained modest losses on Wednesday as the market absorbed a record-sized $70 billion sale of five-year notes.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险解冻，最大石油 ETF 资金流出创纪录
item.description: 由于原油价格失去了伊朗和以色列之间紧张局势带来的部分地缘政治溢价，最大的石油 ETF 美国石油基金（US Oil Fund）出现了有史以来最大的单日资金外流。【原文：US Oil Fund, the biggest oil ETF, posted its largest daily outflow on record as crude prices lose some of the geopolitical premium that was built in from tensions between Iran and Israel.】

item.title: B.莱利姗姗来迟的数据提振了股价，但未能平息怀疑论者的情绪
item.description: B.瑞利金融公司（Biley Financial Inc. ）终于发布了逾期未交的年度报告，从而使其股价一路飙升，这既为这家精品投资银行的粉丝提供了动力，也为那些认为其会计核算存在严重缺陷的怀疑论者提供了动力。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. sent its stock soaring by finally delivering its overdue annual report, which provided fuel both for fans of the boutique investment bank and skeptics who contend its accounting is deeply flawed.】

item.title: 不情愿的交易者保护自己，避免市场进一步混乱
item.description: 面对今年的涨势，一直不愿对冲投资组合的股市投资者开始重新考虑这一策略。【原文：Stock market investors who have been reluctant to hedge their portfolios in the face of this year’s gains are starting to reconsider that strategy.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体拉拢国会追查非法短裤指控
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司公布了一封致美国众议院各委员会负责人的信，对其股票可能受到非法卖空形式冲击的说法进行了双倍的否认。【原文：Donald Trump’s social media startup publicized a letter to the heads of various US House of Representatives committees, doubling down on claims that an illegal form of short selling may be hitting its stock.】

item.title: 近半数英国税务人员错过了在办公室工作的目标
item.description: 据英国税务部门的高级官员称，英国近一半的税务人员都没有达到政府部门关于工作人员每周三天在办公室工作的要求。【原文：Almost half of Britain’s tax collectors are failing to meet the government department’s requirement for staff to work from the office three days a week, according to its top official.】

item.title: 法国科技公司 Harvest 吸引了 Wendel 和 Cinven 的兴趣
item.description: 知情人士称，Five Arrows 出售财富管理软件公司嘉实（Harvest）的交易吸引了包括法国投资集团 Wendel SE 和收购公司 Cinven 在内的一些收购者的初步兴趣。【原文：Five Arrows’ sale of wealth management software company Harvest is attracting initial interest from suitors including French investment group Wendel SE and buyout firm Cinven, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Codelco 在 SQM 股东大会前为锂矿交易辩护
item.description: 智利国有铜业公司 Codelco 为其与 SQM 公司的锂生产合作提案进行了辩护，以回应关于谈判过程不透明的批评。【原文：Chile’s state copper company Codelco defended its proposed lithium production tie-up with SQM in response to criticism that the negotiation process has been opaque.】

item.title: 瑞穗称美元抢购潮可能即将来临
item.description: 瑞穗国际有限公司（Mizuho International Plc）表示，掉期市场正在发出警告，美元流动性可能会出现上一次在大流行病初期出现的规模。【原文：The swaps market is flashing warnings there could be a dash for dollar liquidity on a scale last seen at the start of the pandemic, according to Mizuho International Plc.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛计划在里斯本设立办事处，发掘葡萄牙的富裕阶层
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）计划明年在里斯本开设办事处，以利用越来越多在葡萄牙定居的富裕外国人的财富。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. plans to open an office in Lisbon next year as it seeks to tap into the wealth of a growing number of affluent foreigners taking up residence in Portugal.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易台称，S&P 500 指数有望进一步上涨
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A JPMorgan Chase & Co. indicator is flashing a resounding buy signal in US stocks, after it hit a threshold that typically precedes better-than-average gains.】

item.title: 津巴布韦副总统称津巴布韦 ZiG 是弃用美元的第一步
item.description: 津巴布韦副总统康斯坦丁诺-奇文加（Constantino Chiwenga）说，津巴布韦的新货币是朝着最终放弃在经济中使用美元迈出的一步。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new currency is a step toward eventually abandoning the use of US dollars in the economy, Vice President Constantino Chiwenga said.】

item.title: 联合利华冰淇淋出售不会改变我们，本-杰瑞说
item.description: Ben & Jerry 的独立董事会表示，即使母公司联合利华集团（Unilever Plc）出售或分拆冰淇淋部门，也不会停止监督该品牌的 "社会使命"。【原文：Ben & Jerry’s independent board said it won’t stop overseeing the “social mission” of the brand even if parent company Unilever Plc sells or spins off the ice cream unit.】
